Bala Hijam is a Manipuri actress, who predominantly appears in Manipuri and South Indian movie. Her is basically from Imphal, Manipur, India. Bala works in Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam and Kannada Film Industry. She was made her screen debut in Film Imagi Laman Singamdre (2010) as Niti.

Biography & Wiki

Bala Hijam’s full name is Sur Bala Hijam. She was born on 9 June 1992 in Imphal, Manipur, India. Hence, her current age is 27 years. Bala’s Zodiac is Gemini.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Bala’s family is basically from Imphal, Manipur, India. Her father’s name is Hijam Biramangol and her mother’s name is Hijam Suniti Devi. Her mother is a housewife. As for her father runs a small business of his own. She has four brothers and sisters. she has an elder sister, a younger sister and a younger brother. she’s the second eldest among her siblings.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Bala Hijam was in a serious relationship with Dinesh. She married with Dinesh on 16th March 2020.

Bala Hijam filmography

Bala’s uncle who’s named Irom Maipak is a cinematographer who gave her a chance to act in a movie, the film called “Telanga Mamei“. She was in the 7th standard then.

Bala works in Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam and Kannada Film Industry. She was made her screen debut in Film Imagi Laman Singamdre (2010) as Niti. Bala is working with Many Films in different Languages. She has also acted in one Malayalam thriller road film, named Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi. Bala Hijam’s recent project is Mr. Khadang in 2017. Bala started shooting for her Bollywood debut Zindagi on the Rocks but was left incomplete due to some issues.

Awards & Recognition

Bala won the Best Actress Award at 8th Manipur State Film Festival, 2013 for the film Yaiskulgee Pakhang Angaoba. She acquired pan-Indian success in 2013.

Salary and Net Worth

Bala has a net worth of $2.5 million dollars as of 2019. She is taking 30-40 lakh per movie as a salary.
